column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Aang says : " Ladies and gentlemen , the Flamey - O 's !
#Text=" Aang says : " This is when you start dancing .
#Text=" Male student # 1 says : " I do n't think my parents want me dancing in a cave ... " Male student # 2 says : " Yeah !
#Text=What if someone finds out ?!
#Text=" Aang says : " Oh boy .
#Text=Listen guys , dancing is n't something you think about .
#Text=It 's a form of self - expression that no one can ever take away from you .
#Text=" Shoji says : " Maybe it was different in the colonies , Kuzon , but we do n't do that here .
#Text=" Aang says : " Sure you do , you have for generations !
#Text=It just so happens that I know several classic Fire Nation dances .
#Text=A hundred years ago , this was known as the ' Phoenix Flight ' .
#Text=And , this was the ' Camelephant Strut ' .
#Text=" Toph says : " Who knew Twinkle Toes could dance ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " I brought you some komodo chicken .
#Text=I know you do n't care for it , but I figure it beats prison food .
#Text=I admit it , I have everything I always wanted , but it 's not as all how I thought it would be .
#Text=The truth is , I need your advice .
#Text=I think the Avatar is still alive , I know he 's out there , I 'm losing my mind .
#Text=Please , Uncle , I 'm so confused I need your help .
#Text=Forget it , I 'll solve it myself !
#Text=Waste away in here for all I care !
#Text="
